<style>
/* Override global center alignment for resume page */
#title-block-header {
    text-align: left !important;
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem !important;
    padding-bottom: 1rem !important;
}

#title-block-header .quarto-title {
    text-align: left !important;
}

#title-block-header .quarto-title h1.title {
    text-align: left !important;
    margin-left: 0 !important;
    margin-right: auto !important;
    font-size: 2.5rem;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

#title-block-header .quarto-title-meta {
    text-align: left !important;
    align-items: flex-start !important;
}

/* Hide default title description */
#title-block-header .description {
    display: none;
}

/* Modern resume page container - wider and less padding */
.resume-page {
    max-width: 1400px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 1rem 2rem 2rem 2rem;
}

/* Subtitle styling */
.resume-subtitle {
    color: #666;
    font-size: 1rem;
    margin: 0.5rem 0 1.5rem 0;
    font-weight: 400;
}

/* Animated callout - clean and organized */
.resume-page .callout-tip {
    position: relative;
    animation: gentlePulse 3s ease-in-out infinite;
    border-left: 4px solid #ffc107 !important;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.3);
    margin: 1.5rem 0 !important;
    overflow: visible;
}

.resume-page .callout-tip .callout-header {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.75rem;
    padding-left: 1rem;
}

.resume-page .callout-tip .callout-icon-container {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    width: 2rem;
    height: 2rem;
    flex-shrink: 0;
}

.resume-page .callout-tip .callout-icon-container::before {
    content: 'ðŸ’¡';
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    line-height: 1;
    animation: bulbFlicker 2s ease-in-out infinite;
    filter: drop-shadow(0 0 8px rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.6));
    display: block;
}

.resume-page .callout-tip .callout-icon-container i {
    display: none;
}

.resume-page .callout-tip .callout-title-container {
    flex: 1;
}

.resume-page .callout-tip .callout-body {
    padding-left: 1rem;
}

@keyframes gentlePulse {
    0%, 100% {
        box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.3);
    }
    50% {
        box-shadow: 0 6px 30px rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.5);
    }
}

@keyframes bulbFlicker {
    0%, 100% {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: scale(1);
        filter: drop-shadow(0 0 8px rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.6));
    }
    25% {
        opacity: 0.85;
        transform: scale(0.98);
        filter: drop-shadow(0 0 12px rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.8));
    }
    50% {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: scale(1.03);
        filter: drop-shadow(0 0 15px rgba(255, 193, 7, 1));
    }
    75% {
        opacity: 0.9;
        transform: scale(0.99);
        filter: drop-shadow(0 0 10px rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.7));
    }
}

html[data-theme='dark'] .resume-page .callout-tip {
    border-left-color: #ffc107 !important;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.4);
}

html[data-theme='dark'] .resume-page .callout-tip .callout-icon-container::before {
    filter: drop-shadow(0 0 10px rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.8));
}

/* Simple download button */
.resume-download-btn {
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 0.625rem 1.5rem;
    background: #007bff;
    color: #ffffff;
    text-decoration: none;
    border-radius: 6px;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    font-weight: 500;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
    border: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.resume-download-btn:hover {
    background: #0056b3;
    transform: translateY(-1px);
    box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 123, 255, 0.3);
    color: #ffffff;
    text-decoration: none;
}

html[data-theme='dark'] .resume-subtitle {
    color: #b0b0b0;
}

html[data-theme='dark'] .resume-download-btn {
    background: #3b82f6;
}

html[data-theme='dark'] .resume-download-btn:hover {
    background: #2563eb;
}

/* PDF embed container - wider with smaller borders */
.embed-container {
    position: relative;
    padding-bottom: 129%;
    height: 0;
    overflow: hidden;
    max-width: 100%;
    border-radius: 4px;
    box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
    margin: 0;
    background: #ffffff;
    border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.embed-container:hover {
    box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.embed-container iframe {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    border-radius: 4px;
    border: none;
    background: #ffffff;
}

/* Footer - minimal and compact */
.resume-footer {
    text-align: left;
    margin-top: 2rem;
    padding-top: 1.5rem;
    border-top: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
}

.resume-footer p {
    margin: 0;
    color: #888;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    font-weight: 400;
}

/* Dark mode support */
html[data-theme='dark'] #title-block-header {
    border-bottom: none;
}

html[data-theme='dark'] .embed-container {
    background: #1a1a1a;
    border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}

html[data-theme='dark'] .embed-container:hover {
    box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
}

html[data-theme='dark'] .embed-container iframe {
    background: #1a1a1a;
}

html[data-theme='dark'] .resume-footer {
    border-top-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
}

html[data-theme='dark'] .resume-footer p {
    color: #888 !important;
}

/* Responsive design */
@media (max-width: 1200px) {
    .resume-page {
        max-width: 100%;
        padding: 1rem 1.5rem 2rem 1.5rem;
    }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .resume-page {
        padding: 1rem 1rem 1.5rem 1rem;
    }
    
    #title-block-header .quarto-title h1.title {
        font-size: 2rem;
    }
    
    .resume-download-btn {
        width: 100%;
        text-align: center;
    }
    
    .embed-container {
        padding-bottom: 145%;
        border-radius: 3px;
    }
    
    .resume-footer {
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
        padding-top: 1rem;
    }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
    #title-block-header .quarto-title h1.title {
        font-size: 1.75rem;
    }
    
    .embed-container {
        padding-bottom: 160%;
    }
}

/* Print styles */
@media print {
    .resume-download-btn,
    .resume-footer {
        display: none;
    }
    
    .embed-container {
        box-shadow: none;
        border: none;
        padding-bottom: 129%;
    }
}
</style>
